course_description: This clerkship provides students with exposure to the principles and practice of Primary Care. Emphasis is placed on caring for patients with general medical problems in outpatient or inpatient settings. Students will participate in taking medical histories, physical examination, assessment and formulation of a plan and problem list, ordering and interpreting diagnostic tests, proper medical documentation, and reporting to the healthcare team as appropriate for the clerkship. students may participate in rounds; provide patient presentations to clinical team members, and perform procedures.
